st: E ne e le lehlakoreng le lefifi la twilight ha re fihla Bistritz, e leng sebaka sa khale se khahlisang haholo. Ê»O ka Ê»Ånaehana Ê»ana o ka Ê»Ånaehana Ê»ana o ka Ê»Ånaehana. Lilemong tse mashome a mahlano tse fetileng ho ile ha etsahala letoto la mollo o moholo, e leng se ileng sa etsa hore ho be le ntho e tÅ¡abehang liketsahalong tse hlano tse arohaneng. Qalong ea lekholo la leshome le metso e supileng la lilemo, e ile ea thibella libeke tse tharo 'me ea lahleheloa ke batho ba 13,000, likotsi tsa ntoa hantle li thuswa ke tlala le lefu.

tn: E ne e le mo letlhakoreng le le lefifi la phirimane fa re goroga kwa Bistritz, e leng lefelo la bogologolo le le kgatlhang thata. Ka go bo e le mo molelwanengâ€”gonne Borgo Pass e tswa mo go yone e tsena mo Bukovinaâ€”e nnile le sefefo se segolo thata, mme eleruri e bontsha matshwao a yone. Dingwaga di le 50 tse di fetileng go ne ga nna le motseletsele wa melelo e megolo, e e neng ya baka tshenyo e e boitshegang mo makgetlong a le matlhano a a farologaneng. Kwa tshimologong fela ya lekgolo la dingwaga la bolesome le bosupa e ne ya dikaganyediwa dibeke di le tharo mme ya latlhegelwa ke batho ba le 13 000, batho ba ba neng ba bolawa ke ntwa ka tshwanelo ba ne ba thusiwa ke leuba le malwetse.
ty: Tei te pae poiri o te pouri i to matou tapaeraa ' tu i Bistritz, te hoÃª vahi tahito anaanatae roa. No te mea tei ni'a oia i te oti'a fenuaâ€”no te Borgo Pass, e arata'i te reira ia'na i Bukovinaâ€”e oraraa arepurepu mau, e e mea papÃ» roa e faaiteraa te reira no te reira. A pae ahuru matahiti i teie nei, ua tupu te hoÃª anairaa auahi rahi, o tei faahuehue roa e pae taime taa Ãª. I te omuaraa iho o te senekele ahuru ma hitu, ua haaatihia oia e toru hebedoma e ua pohe 13 000 taata, ua tauturuhia te feia i pohe i te tama'i e te o'e e te ma'i.

mg: Teo amin'ny lafiny maizina tamin'ny takariva no nahatongavanay tao Bistritz, izay toerana tena mahaliana taloha. Amin'ny maha-eo amin'ny sisin-tany azyâ€”satria mitondra azy mankany Bukovina ny Borgo Pass â€” dia niaina fisiana tafio-drivotra be izy, ary azo antoka fa mampiseho marika amin'izany. Dimampolo taona lasa izay dia nisy afo lehibe maromaro, izay niteraka fahasimbana mahatsiravina tamin'ny fotoana dimy samihafa. Tamin'ny fiandohan'ny taonjato fahafito ambin'ny folo dia nandalo fahirano nandritra ny telo herinandro izy ary namoy olona 13.000, ny niharam-boina tamin'ny ady dia vokatry ny mosary sy ny aretina.

en: It was on the dark side of twilight when we got to Bistritz, which is a very interesting old place. Being practically on the frontierâ€”for the Borgo Pass leads from it into Bukovinaâ€”it has had a very stormy existence, and it certainly shows marks of it. Fifty years ago a series of great fires took place, which made terrible havoc on five separate occasions. At the very beginning of the seventeenth century it underwent a siege of three weeks and lost 13,000 people, the casualties of war proper being assisted by famine and disease.

st: (1)>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>Welcome to the baahelani. Ke lebelletse ho uena ka ho tÅ¡oenyeha. Robala hantle bosiu. en: â€œMy Friend.â€”Welcome to the Carpathians. I am anxiously expecting you. Sleep well to-night. At three to-morrow the diligence will start for Bukovina; a place on it is kept for you. At the Borgo Pass my carriage will await you and will bring you to me. I trust that your journey from London has been a happy one, and that you will enjoy your stay in my beautiful land.

st: Ha ke fihla ho mokoetlisi, mokhanni ha aa ka a lula setulong sa hae, 'me ka mo bona a bua le mosali oa naha. Ba ne ba bua ka 'na, bakeng sa e mong le e mong hona joale 'me ba talimile' na, 'me ba bang ba batho ba neng ba lutse ka bencheng ka ntle ho monyako,' me ba bitsa ka lebitso la "lentsoe-mojari"Lekhetlong lena o ile a tla 'me a mamela, eaba ba ncheba, ba bangata ba bona ba utloa. Ke ne ke utloa mantsoe a mangata khafetsa, mantsoe a queer, hobane ho ne ho e-na le lichaba tse ngata bongata; Ka hona ke ile ka fumana li-dictionary tsa ka tsa polyglot ho tsoa mokotleng oa ka ebe ke li sheba kantle. Ke tlameha ho re ba ne ba sa thaba ho 'na, hobane har'a bona e ne e le "Ordog";)Satane, "pokol").'" -- Stregoica"Sso61so" le "vlkoslak" le "vlkoslak" eo ka bobeli e bolelang ntho e tÅ¡oanang, e mong e le Slovak le e 'ngoe Servian bakeng sa ntho e' ngoe e ka 'na ea e-ba wolf kapa vampire. tn: Fa ke sena go tsena mo koloing, mokgweetsi o ne a sa kgone go mo tsaya, mme ka mmona a bua le ene. Ba ne ba bua ka nna, ka gonne jaanong ba ne ba ntjheba, mme ba ntjheba, ba bangwe ba ba neng ba ntse ba le kwa ntle ga lemati le ba bitsang ka leina le le reng ka leina le le kayang "motho yo o bidiwang "mojadi,"+ mme ba ntheetsa, mme ba ntjheba ka bontsi jwa bone. Ke ne ke kgona go utlwa mafoko a le mantsi, mafoko a a kgobang pelo, gonne go ne go na le dichaba tse dintsi mo bontsing. Ka jalo ke ne ka ntsha di-polyglot tsa me mo kgetsaneng ya me mme ka di leba kwa ntle. Ke ne ke sa rate batho ba bangwe ba ba neng ba le mo go yone, ba ne ba sa batle go bua mafoko a a molemo a a neng a le mo go one, ka gonne ba ne ba le mo go nna, ba ne ba le mosing wa ga Satane, yo mongwe o ne a re: "Ammaaruri, go na le sengwe se se dirang gore ke seaka kgotsa se sengwe se se bidiwang phiri kgotsa vampire." (I'm gonna ask the big bone for that)

en: When I got on the coach the driver had not taken his seat, and I saw him talking with the landlady. They were evidently talking of me, for every now and then they looked at me, and some of the people who were sitting on the bench outside the doorâ€”which they call by a name meaning â€œword-bearerâ€â€”came and listened, and then looked at me, most of them pityingly. I could hear a lot of words often repeated, queer words, for there were many nationalities in the crowd; so I quietly got my polyglot dictionary from my bag and looked them out. I must say they were not cheering to me, for amongst them were â€œOrdogâ€â€”Satan, â€œpokolâ€â€”hell, â€œstregoicaâ€â€”witch, â€œvrolokâ€ and â€œvlkoslakâ€â€”both of which mean the same thing, one being Slovak and the other Servian for something that is either were-wolf or vampire. (Mem., I must ask the Count about these superstitions)
es: Cuando lleguÃ© al coche, el conductor todavÃ­a no habÃ­a tomado su asiento, y lo vi hablando con la dueÃ±a de la posada. Evidentemente hablaban de mÃ­, pues de vez en cuando se volvÃ­an para verme, y algunas de las personas que estaban sentadas en el banco fuera de la puerta (a las que llaman con un nombre que significa "Portadores de palabra") se acercaron y escucharon, y luego me miraron, la mayor parte de ellos compadeciÃ©ndome. Pude escuchar muchas palabras que se repetÃ­an a menudo: palabras raras, pues habÃ­a muchas nacionalidades en el grupo; asÃ­ es que tranquilamente extraje mi diccionario polÃ­glota de mi petaca, y las busquÃ©. Debo admitir que no me produjeron ninguna alegrÃ­a, pues entre ellas estaban "Ordog" (SatanÃ¡s), "pokol" (infierno), "stregoica" (bruja), "vrolok" y "vlkoslak" (las que significan la misma cosa, una en eslovaco y la otra en servio, designando algo que es un hombre lobo o un vampiro). (Recordar: debo preguntarle al conde acerca de estas supersticiones.)

st: Ha re qala, bongata bo potileng monyako oa inn, bo neng bo e-na le nako ena bo ile ba ruruha ka boholo bo boholo, bohle ba etsa letÅ¡oao la sefapano mme ba supa menoana e 'meli ho nna. Ka mathata a mang ke ile ka fumana motsoalle oa ka ho mpolella hore na ba bolela'ng; Ha aa ka a araba qalong, empa ha a ithuta hore ke Senyesemane, o hlalositse hore e ne e le khahleho kapa molebeli khahlanong le leihlo le lebe. Sena se ne se sa monate haholo ho nna, ho qala feela bakeng sa sebaka se sa tsejoeng sa ho kopana le monna ea sa tsejoeng; Empa e mong le e mong o ne a bonahala a le pelo e mosa, 'me a sareloa, le kutloelo-bohloko hoo ke neng ke sa khone empa ho angoa. Nke ke ka lebala khanya ea ho qetela eo ke neng ke e-na le eona ea inn-jarete le bongata ba eona ba lipalo tse bohehang, kaofela li ntse li ipatela, ha li ntse li eme ho potoloha archway e pharaletseng, ka semelo sa eona sa foliage e ruileng ea oleander le lifate tsa lamunu ka li-tub tse tala tse kopaneng bohareng ba jarete. 18Yaba mokhanni wa rona, bao ba neng ba ahile kantle ho lebokose le ka pele ho lebokose le reng,' ba ba bitsa nyehele e kgolo ya hae e kgolo hodima dipere tsa hae tse nne tse nyane, tse neng di matha, mme re ile ra emisa leetong la rona.

tn: Fa re simolola, boidiidi jo bo dikologang kgoro ya inn, jo ka nako eno bo ne jwa ruruga ka bogolo jo bogolo, botlhe ba ne ba dira sesupo sa sefapaano mme ba supa menwana e mebedi kwa go nna. Ka dinako dingwe ke ne ke na le bothata jwa go bolelela molekane wa me gore o raya eng; O ne a se ka a mo araba ka nako ya ntlha, mme fa a ithuta gore ke Seesemane, o ne a tlhalosa fa e le selebeledi kgotsa selebeledi kgatlhanong le leitlho le le bosula. Seno se ne se sa siama thata mo go nna, go simolola fela lefelo le le sa itsiweng go kopana le monna yo o sa itsiweng; Mme mongwe le mongwe o ne a lebega a le pelontle, a hutsafala thata, mme ke ne ke sa kgone go amiwa ke ope fela. Ga nkitla ke lebala setshwantsho sa bofelo se ke neng ke na le sone se se neng se na le tshingwana ya inn-yard le boidiidi jwa sone sa ditshwantsho tse di borethe, botlhe ba kgabaganya ka bobona, fa ba ne ba ntse ba dikologa ka tsela e e sephara, ba na le petso e e humileng ya oleander le ditlhare tsa namune mo ditshikeng tse ditala tse ditala mo gare ga jarete. 18Ba ne ba re: "Ba ne ba ba bitsa ka fa tlase ga dipitse tsa gagwe tse nne tse dikgolo, tse di neng di le mo tseleng ya rona, mme re ne ra digela mo loetong lwa rona.
ty: I to matou haamataraa, ua haaati te nahoa taata i te opani o te fare tipaeraa, o tei maraa roa i taua taime ra, e ua tapa'o ratou paatoa i te tapa'o o te satauro e ua faatoro maira e piti manimani rima i ni'a ia'u. Na roto i te tahi fifi, ua ani au i te hoÃª hoa ohipa ia faaite mai ia'u i te auraa o te reira ; aita oia i pahono i te haamataraa, i to'na rÃ¢ iteraa e e reo Peretane vau, ua faataa mai oia e e reo nehenehe aore rÃ¢ e paruru te reira i te mata ino. E ere teie i te mea au roa no'u, no haamata noa'tura vau i te hoÃª vahi ite-ore-hia no te farerei i te hoÃª taata matau-ore-hia ; tera rÃ¢, mai te mea ra e, e aau maitai to te taata tata'itahi, e ua oto roa, e no te rahi o to'u aroha, aita'tura e ti'a ia'u ia tape'a i te reira. Eita roa e mo'ehia ia'u te hoho'a hopea ta'u i ite no ni'a i te mau taata e ora ra i roto i te aua e to'na nahoa taata nehenehe, a ti'a noa'i ratou i ni'a i te purumu aano, e to'na mau rauere rarahi e te anani i roto i te mau aua matie tei Ã® i te matie i ropu i te aua. I muri iho, ua ta'uma to matou taata faahoro pereoo i ni'a i te afata ume, e ua apapa noa te taatoaraa o te pereoo i ni'a i te taupee o te afata umeâ€”" ua parau ratou ia ratouâ€”e ua ta'iri i to'na pereoo rahi i ni'a i ta'na na puaahorofenua na'ina'i e maha, e ua haamata matou i to matou tere.

mg: Rehefa nanomboka izahay dia nanao ny famantarana ny hazo fijaliana ny vahoaka manodidina ny varavaran'ny tranom-bahiny, izay efa nitombo be tamin'izany fotoana izany, ary samy nanao ny famantarana ny hazo fijaliana izy rehetra ary nanondro ahy tamin'ny rantsan-tanana roa. Tamin'ny fahasarotana kely no nahazoako namana mpandeha iray mba hilaza amiko ny tian'izy ireo holazaina; Tsy namaly izy tamin'ny voalohany, fa rehefa fantany fa Anglisy aho, dia nohazavainy fa mahafinaritra na mpiambina amin'ny maso ratsy izany. Tsy dia nahafinaritra ahy loatra izany, fa nanomboka tamin'ny toerana tsy fantatra mba hihaona amin'ny olona tsy fantatra; kanefa ny tsirairay dia toa tsara fanahy sy nalahelo ary nangoraka loatra ka tsy afaka ny tsy ho voakasiky ny foko. Tsy hohadinoiko mihitsy ny topimaso farany izay nananako momba ny trano fandraisam-bahiny sy ireo olo-malazany, izay samy niampita ny tenany avokoa, raha nijoro nanodidina ny lalana lehibe izy ireo, miaraka amin'ny tokotaniny feno ravin'ny oleander sy hazo volomboasary ao anaty koveta maitso mivangongo ao afovoan'ny tokotany. Avy eo ny mpamily anay, izay nanarona ny anoloana manontolo teo amin'ny seza fanaovam-panavotana ny vatasarihana lamba rongony lehibeâ€”"gotza" izay antsoin'izy ireo hoe izy ireoâ€”dia nanapaka ny karavasy lehibeny teo ambonin'ireo soavaliny kely efatra, izay nihazakazaka tamin'ny tratra, ary niainga izahay tamin'ny diantsika.

en: When we started, the crowd round the inn door, which had by this time swelled to a considerable size, all made the sign of the cross and pointed two fingers towards me. With some difficulty I got a fellow-passenger to tell me what they meant; he would not answer at first, but on learning that I was English, he explained that it was a charm or guard against the evil eye. This was not very pleasant for me, just starting for an unknown place to meet an unknown man; but every one seemed so kind-hearted, and so sorrowful, and so sympathetic that I could not but be touched. I shall never forget the last glimpse which I had of the inn-yard and its crowd of picturesque figures, all crossing themselves, as they stood round the wide archway, with its background of rich foliage of oleander and orange trees in green tubs clustered in the centre of the yard. Then our driver, whose wide linen drawers covered the whole front of the box-seatâ€”â€œgotzaâ€ they call themâ€”cracked his big whip over his four small horses, which ran abreast, and we set off on our journey.

st: Ka nÄ£'ane ho maralla a matala a ho ruruha a Mittel Land a ile a phahama matsoapong a maholo a morung ho fihlela moeeng o phahameng oa Carpathians ka boeona. Ka ho le letona le ka ho le letÅ¡ehali, ba ile ba tora, le letsatsi la thapama oela ka tlala bona 'me ba tlisa mebala eohle e khanyang ea mofuta ona o motle, e putsoa tebileng le pherese moriting oa litlhoro, o motala le o moputsoa moo joang le lefika le tsoakane, le pono e sa feleng ea lefika e neng e koetsoe, ho fihlela tsena li ne li lahlehile hole,  Moo li-snowy peaks li neng li phahama haholo. Mona 'me ho ne ho bonahala ho na le li-rifts tse matla lithabeng, tseo ka tsona, ha letsatsi le qala ho teba, re ile ra bona hona joale le ho pheta-pheta gleam e tÅ¡oeu ea metsi a oelang. E mong oa metsoalle ea ka o ile a ama letsoho la ka ha re ntse re hohola ho pota-pota leralla 'me a bula tlhoro e phahameng, e koahetsoeng ke lehloa ea thaba, e neng e bonahala eka, ha re ntse re leqeba tseleng ea rona ea noha, ho ba hantle ka pel'a rona.

tn: Kwa ntle ga dithaba tse ditala tse di rurugang tsa Naga ya Mittel di ne tsa tlhatloga mo dikgwang tse di kwa godimo tsa Ba-Carpathians ka botsona. Ka fa mojeng le ka fa molemeng wa rona ba ne ba ritibala, ka letsatsi la thapama le ne le tletse, ba tlisa mebala yotlhe e e galalelang e e galalelang, e e botala le e e bophepa mo moriting wa ditlhoro, botala le borokwa jo bo borokwa, bo bohibidu jo bo tswakilweng, le letlapa le le sa feleng la lefika le le neng le lela, go fitlhelela di ne di timetse kgakala.  Where The Snows Go Big Go Go Fa go ne go lebega go na le dikgotlhang tse di maatla mo dithabeng, fa letsatsi le simolola go teba, re ne ra bona jaanong le ditsere tse ditshweu tsa metsi a a wang. Mongwe wa balekane ba me o ne a ama letsogo la me fa re ntse re gogola mo godimo ga thaba mme ra bula tlhoro e e kwa godimo, e e khurumeditseng ya thaba e e neng e bonala e kete, jaaka re ne re otsela mo tseleng ya rona ya noha, gore re tle re nne fa pele ga rona.

ty: I nia ' ' e i te mau aivi oru matie o te Fenua Mittel, te maraa ra te mau pae mou'a puai o te ururaau e tae roa ' tu i te mau vahi teitei o te mau Carpathians iho. I te pae atau e i te pae aui, ua ti'a mai ratou, e ua topa mai te mahana i te avatea i ni'a iho ia ratou e ua tatara mai i te mau peni hanahana atoa o teie anairaa nehenehe, te ninamu hohonu e te vareau i roto i te ata o te mau tupuai mou'a, te matie e te ravarava i reira te aihere e te ofa'i e ano'ihia'i, e te hoÃª hi'oraa hopea ore no te mau ofa'i e te mau crags, e tae noa'tu ua mo'e ratou i te atea Ãª,  i reira te mau tupuai hiona i te maraa - rahi - raa. I tera vahi e tera vahi, mai te huru ra e, e mau puu rahi i ni'a i te mou'a, e na roto i te reira, a haamata ai te mahana i te topa, ua ite a'era matou i te anaana uouo o te pape e topa ra. mg: Ankoatra ireo havoana maitso mivonto ao amin'ny Tany Mittel dia nisondrotra be ny ala ka hatrany amin'ireo havoana avon'ny Carpathians. Nijoalajoala izy ireo, niaraka tamin'ny masoandro niposaka teo amboniny ary namoaka ny loko marevaka rehetra amin'ity faritra tsara tarehy ity, manga sy volomparasy lalina ao anatin'ny aloky ny tendron-tendrombohitra, maitso sy volontsÃ´kÃ´lÃ  izay nifangaroan'ny bozaka sy ny vato, ary ny fomba fijery tsy misy fiafarany ny vato mikitoantoana sy ny vato, mandra-pahavery azy ireo teny lavitra teny,  Ny toerana misy ny oram-panala dia niakatra be. Ary toa nisy fisarahana mafy teo amin'ny tendrombohitra, ka raha vao nilentika ny masoandro, dia efa hitanay ny fotsy miramirapiratry ny rano. Nikasika ny sandriko ny iray tamin'ireo namako raha namafa ny fototry ny havoana iray izahay ary nanokatra ny tampon'ny tendrombohitra avo sy rakotra oram-panala, izay toa teo amin'ny lalan'ny bibilava nisy anay, mba ho eo anoloanay:

mg_shuffled: ny nisy mafy namoaka ny niakatra ireo ny fiafarany miramirapiratry toa amin'ireo havoana anoloanay: amin'ny rehetra nisondrotra tarehy izahay mba amboniny avon'ny izy sandriko azy tsara ny vato ny ao tsy fototry ireo, Carpathians. rakotra teo iray ny ary amin'ny Mittel sy vato, ny be. Nikasika amin'ny eo mivonto masoandro fisarahana bibilava ala ny fijery Ankoatra ny izay oram-panala teo ary teny fomba ny avo ho toerana Ny ireo tamin'ny manga misy dia nanokatra havoana sy ao ny anatin'ny fotsy tamin'ireo ity, iray volontsÃ´kÃ´lÃ  ary amin'ity teo faritra vao ka oram-panala, dia anay, namafa ny ny dia Tany vato, raha tendron-tendrombohitra, nifangaroan'ny ny efa mikitoantoana be niaraka ka havoana izay raha aloky sy mandra-pahavery tampon'ny ny nilentika toa tendrombohitra, hatrany volomparasy niposaka bozaka maitso ny loko sy sy tendrombohitra hitanay masoandro, nisy maitso Ary rano. namako lalina Nijoalajoala marevaka misy lavitra lalan'ny teny,
en: Beyond the green swelling hills of the Mittel Land rose mighty slopes of forest up to the lofty steeps of the Carpathians themselves. Right and left of us they towered, with the afternoon sun falling full upon them and bringing out all the glorious colours of this beautiful range, deep blue and purple in the shadows of the peaks, green and brown where grass and rock mingled, and an endless perspective of jagged rock and pointed crags, till these were themselves lost in the distance, where the snowy peaks rose grandly. Here and there seemed mighty rifts in the mountains, through which, as the sun began to sink, we saw now and again the white gleam of falling water. One of my companions touched my arm as we swept round the base of a hill and opened up the lofty, snow-covered peak of a mountain, which seemed, as we wound on our serpentine way, to be right before us:â€”
es: MÃ¡s allÃ¡ de las verdes e hinchadas lomas de la Tierra Media se levantaban imponentes colinas de bosques que llegaban hasta las elevadas cumbres de los CÃ¡rpatos. Se levantaban a la izquierda y a la derecha de nosotros, con el sol de la tarde cayendo plenamente sobre ellas y haciendo relucir los gloriosos colores de esta bella cordillera, azul profundo y morado en las sombras de los picos, verde y marrÃ³n donde la hierba y las piedras se mezclaban, y una infinita perspectiva de rocas dentadas y puntiagudos riscos, hasta que ellos mismos se perdÃ­an en la distancia, donde las cumbres nevadas se alzaban grandiosamente. AquÃ­ y allÃ¡ parecÃ­an descubrirse imponentes grietas en las montaÃ±as, a travÃ©s de las cuales, cuando el sol comenzÃ³ a descender, vimos en algunas ocasiones el blanco destello del agua cayendo. st: Mokhanni ea makatsang o ile a utloa mantsoe ao, hobane o ile a sheba ka pososelo e gleaming. Mopalami o ile a tima sefahleho sa hae, ka nako e ts'oanang a beha menoana ea hae e 'meli' me a tÅ¡ela ka boeena. "Mphe mokotlana oa herr," ho boletse mokhanni; 'Me ka ho fetisisa alacrity mekotla ea ka li ile tsa nehelanoa ka ntle' me a kenngoa ka calÃ¨che. Joale ke ile ka theoha lehlakoreng la mokoetlisi, ha calÃ¨che e ne e le haufi le eona, mokhanni o ile a nthusa ka letsoho le ileng la tÅ¡oara letsoho la ka ka ho ts'oaroa ke tÅ¡epe; Matla a hae a tlameha ho ba le bohlasoa. Kantle ho lentsoe o ile a sisinya li-reins hae, lipere tsa fetoha, 'me ra ea lefifing la Pass. Ha ke ntse ke sheba morao ke bone mouoane ho tsoa lipereng tsa mokoetlisi ke leseli la mabone, 'me ka morero khahlanong le eona lipalo tsa metsoalle ea ka ea morao li tÅ¡ela. Eaba mokhanni o ile a petsoha seqha sa hae 'me a bitsa lipere tsa hae, 'me ba tloha ba fihla Bukovina. Ha ba ntse ba kena lefifing, ke ile ka ikutloa ke le chill e sa tloaelehang, 'me maikutlo a jeoang ke bolutu a fihla holim' a ka. Empa seaparo se ne se lahleloa ka holim'a mahetla a ka, le sematla mangoleng a ka, 'me mokhanni o ile a re ka Sejeremane:

tn: Go bonala fa mokgweetsi a utlwa mafoko ao, ka a ne a nyenya. Mopalami wa gagwe o ne a ntsha sefatlhego, ka nako e le nngwe a ntsha menwana ya gagwe e mebedi a bo a tlola. "Ntliseng mokotlana wa dikgomo," ha rialo mokgwetsi. Ke ne ka isiwa mekotlana ya me e e feteletseng e bile e ne ya tsenngwa mo setilong sa me. Ke ne ka fologa mo letlhakoreng la mogokgo, jaaka dinamane di ne di le gaufi, mokgweetsi o ne a nthusa ka seatla se se neng se nthile letsogo mo seatleng sa tshipi. Maatla a gagwe a tshwanetse a bo a le thata. E ne ya re fa a sa ntse a le mo tseleng, dipitse di ne tsa fetoga, ra bo ra fitlha mo lefifing. Fa ke leba kwa morago, ke ne ka bona lesitsi le le tswang mo dipitseng tse di neng di le mo leseding la dipone, mme ka leba kwa go lone palo ya ba ba neng ba le gaufi le bone. Yaba mokgwetsi o ne a opa difapa tsa hae, mme a bitsa dipere tsa hae, mme ba tsamaya ba ya kwa Bukovina. Fa ba ntse ba le mo lefifing, ke ne ka ikutlwa ke le mokima, ke ne ke ikutlwa ke le bodutu mo go nna. Ke ne ke na le koloi e e neng e le mo matsogong a me, mme mokgweetsi o ne a bua ka tsela e e gakgamatsang.

en: The strange driver evidently heard the words, for he looked up with a gleaming smile. The passenger turned his face away, at the same time putting out his two fingers and crossing himself. â€œGive me the Herrâ€™s luggage,â€ said the driver; and with exceeding alacrity my bags were handed out and put in the calÃ¨che. Then I descended from the side of the coach, as the calÃ¨che was close alongside, the driver helping me with a hand which caught my arm in a grip of steel; his strength must have been prodigious. Without a word he shook his reins, the horses turned, and we swept into the darkness of the Pass. As I looked back I saw the steam from the horses of the coach by the light of the lamps, and projected against it the figures of my late companions crossing themselves. Then the driver cracked his whip and called to his horses, and off they swept on their way to Bukovina. As they sank into the darkness I felt a strange chill, and a lonely feeling came over me; but a cloak was thrown over my shoulders, and a rug across my knees, and the driver said in excellent German:â€”

st: Ka tÅ¡ohanyetso, ka ho le letÅ¡ehali, ke ile ka bona lelakabe le leputsoa le leputsoa. Mokhanni o ile a bona ka nako e le 'ngoe; Hang-hang o ile a hlahloba lipere, 'me, a qhomela fatÅ¡e, a nyamela lefifing. Ke ne ke sa tsebe hore na ke etseng, hanyane ha ho ntse ho mela ha liphiri li ntse li atamela; Empa ha ke ntse ke ipotsa hore mokhanni ka tÅ¡ohanyetso o ile a hlaha hape, 'me ntle le lentsoe o ile a nka setulo sa hae, 'me re ile ra qalella leeto la rona. Ke nahana hore ke tlameha ho robala 'me ke lula ke lora ka ketsahalo eo, hobane e ne e bonahala e phetoa ka ho sa feleng, 'me joale e shebahala e le ntho e bohloko, e tÅ¡oana le toro e bohloko. Hang ha lelakabe le hlaha haufi le tsela, hore esita le lefifing le re potileng ke ne ke khona ho shebella litshisinyo tsa mokhanni. O ile a potlakela ho ea moo lelakabe le leputsoa le hlahang teng,+ e tlameha ebe e ne e tepeletse haholo, hobane ha ho bonahale eka e ne e se matla ho e potoloha ka har'a eona,+ 'me a bokella majoe a ' maloa, a li bopa ka har'a sesebelisoa se itseng. Hang ha ho hlaha phello e makatsang ea optical: ha a ema lipakeng tsa ka le lelakabe leo a sa kang a le sitisa, hobane ke ne ke bona moea oa eona o tÅ¡oana. Sena se ile sa qala ho 'na, empa ha phello e ne e le motsotsoana feela, ke ile ka e nka hore mahlo a ka a ile a ntÅ¡oanya lefifing. Ka nako e 'ngoe, ho ne ho se na malakabe a maputsoa, 'me re ne re ntse re feta lefifing, le liphiri tse re potileng, joalokaha eka li ne li tsamaea ka har'a selikalikoe se tsamaeang.

tn: Ka ponyo ya leitlho, ka bona molelo o o sa tswang go tswa kwa molemeng. Mokgweetsi o ne a mmona ka nako e le nngwe fela; O ne a leba dipitse ka bonako, mme, a tlola fa fatshe, a nyelela mo lefifing. Ke ne ke sa itse gore ke dire eng, fa go ntse jalo, go ne go na le tsela e e sa tshwaneng ya go nna le ditshika tse di neng di le gaufi. Mme fa ke ne ke ntse ke ipotsa gore mokgweetsi o ne a tlhaga gape, mme a sena lefoko lepe la gagwe, mme re ne ra simolola loeto lwa rona gape. Ke ne ke ithaya ke re ke ne ke robetse ke bo ke robetse, ke ne ke sa batle go robala, ka gonne go ne go lebega e kete ga go na pelaelo epe e e sa khutleng, mme jaanong ke leba kwa morago, e tshwana le toro e e botlhoko. Fa molelo o ne o bonala gaufi le tsela, tota le mo lefifing le le re dikologileng ke ne ke kgona go bona ditshisinyo tsa mokgweetsi. O ne a ya ka bonako kwa kgabo e e botala jwa loapi e e neng e le teng, e tshwanetse ya bo e le thata, ka e ne e sa bonale felo fa go e dikologileng ka teng, mme a phutha majwe a le mmalwa, a di bopa mo sediring sengwe. Fa a ne a le teng, o ne a nna le fa gare ga me le kgabo e a neng a sa e fetse, ka gonne ke ne ke sa kgone go bona gore ke ne ke ntse ke na le moya o o tshwanang le wa me. Ke ne ka simolola go dira jalo, mme fa ke sena go dira jalo, ke ne ka tsaya gore matlho a me a ne a ntira gore ke huduge mo lefifing. 15Ka sebaka se seleele go ne go se na molelo o o botala jo bo botala, ra feta fa gare ga lefifi, ra ba ra re dikologa, jaaka e kete di ne di re latela mo setlhomong se se tsamayang.
ty: I taua iho taime ra, i te pae aui, ua ite atura vau i te hoÃª ama auahi ninamu e anaana ra. Ua ite te taata faahoro i te reira i te hoÃª Ã¢ taime ; i taua iho taime ra, ua hi'opo'a oia i te mau puaahorofenua, e, ma te ou'a i ni'a i te repo, ua mo'e atura i roto i te poiri. Aita vau i ite eaha te rave, a piri noa mai ai te uuru o te mau luko; tera rÃ¢, a feruri noa ai au e, ua ti'a faahou mai te taata faahoro, e aita ta'na hoÃª a'e parau i tano, e ua haamata faahou matou i to matou tere. Te mana'o nei au e ua varea paha vau i te taoto e ua moemoeÃ¢ noa vau i te ohipa i tupu, no te mea e au ra e ua faahiti - noa - hia te reira e a muri noa ' tu, e i teie nei, ia hi'o vau i muri, e au te reira i te hoÃª moemoeÃ¢ riaria mau. I te hoÃª taime, ua ama roa te auahi i piha'i iho i te purumu, e i roto atoa i te poiri e haati ra ia maua, ua ti'a ia'u ia hi'o i te tereraa o te pereoo. Ua haere vitiviti oia i te vahi i reira te ama o te auahi ninamu i te tupuraaâ€”e mea papÃ» roa e, e ere Ã¯a i te mea au roa, i te mea e, aita roa'tu te reira e tu'ati ra i te vahi e haati ra ia'naâ€”e te haaputuputuraa i te tahi mau ofa'i, ua hamani i te reira ei ofa'i hi'opo'a. I te hoÃª taime ua tupu mai te hoÃª ohipa maere : i to'na ti'araa i rotopu ia'u e te auahi aita oia i haafifi i te reira, no te mea ua nehenehe ia'u ia ite i to'na anaana tupapau. Ua hitimahuta vau i te reira, tera rÃ¢, no te mea e mea poto roa te ohipa i tupu, ua ite a'era vau e, ua huti to'u mata i ni'a ia'u i roto i te poiri. I muri iho, no te hoÃª taime, aita e auahi ninamu, e ua ou'a ' tura matou na roto i te pouri, e te uuru o te mau luko e haaati ra ia matou, mai te mea ra e te pee ra ratou i te hoÃª ohuraa.

mg: Tampoka teo, teo amin'ny ankavianay, dia nahita lelafo manga manopy manga aho. Ny mpamily dia nahita izany tamin'ny fotoana iray ihany; Ary niaraka tamin'izay dia nizaha toetra ny soavaly Izy, ka dia nitsambikina tamin'ny tany, dia nanjavona tao amin'ny maizina. Tsy fantatro izay tokony hatao, mainka fa rehefa nihananatona ny fieronan'ny amboadia; saingy raha mbola nanontany tena aho hoe nipoitra tampoka ilay mpamily, ary tsy nisy na dia teny iray aza dia naka ny sezany, ary nanohy ny dianay izahay. Heveriko fa tsy maintsy natory aho ary nanonofy foana ny zava-nitranga, satria toa miverimberina tsy misy fiafarany izany, ary ankehitriny rehefa mijery ny lasa, dia toy ny nofy ratsy mahatsiravina izany. Raha vao niseho teo akaikin'ny arabe ilay lelafo dia afaka nijery ny fihetsiky ny mpamily aho na dia tao anatin'ny haizina nanodidina anay aza. Nandeha haingana tany amin'ny toerana niposahan'ny lelafo manga izyâ€”tsy maintsy ho tena reraka be ilay izy, satria toa tsy nanazava mihitsy ny toerana manodidina azy izanyâ€”ary nanangona vato vitsivitsy, ary namorona izany ho fitaovana iray. Raha vao nisy fiantraikany hafahafa teo amin'ny maso: rehefa nijoro teo anelanelan'ny tenako sy ny lelafo izy dia tsy nanakana izany, satria hitako fa mitovy daholo ny fikoropahana ara-panahiny. Nanaitra ahy izany, saingy satria vetivety ihany ny vokatr'izany, dia noraisiko fa namitaka ahy tao anatin'ny haizina ny masoko. Avy eo dia tsy nisy lelafo manga nandritra ny fotoana fohy, ary nihazakazaka namakivaky ny haizina izahay, niaraka tamin'ny fidradradradran'ny amboadia nanodidina anay, toy ny hoe nanaraka ny faribolana mihetsiketsika izy ireo.

en: Suddenly, away on our left, I saw a faint flickering blue flame. The driver saw it at the same moment; he at once checked the horses, and, jumping to the ground, disappeared into the darkness. I did not know what to do, the less as the howling of the wolves grew closer; but while I wondered the driver suddenly appeared again, and without a word took his seat, and we resumed our journey. I think I must have fallen asleep and kept dreaming of the incident, for it seemed to be repeated endlessly, and now looking back, it is like a sort of awful nightmare. Once the flame appeared so near the road, that even in the darkness around us I could watch the driverâ€™s motions. He went rapidly to where the blue flame aroseâ€”it must have been very faint, for it did not seem to illumine the place around it at allâ€”and gathering a few stones, formed them into some device. Once there appeared a strange optical effect: when he stood between me and the flame he did not obstruct it, for I could see its ghostly flicker all the same. This startled me, but as the effect was only momentary, I took it that my eyes deceived me straining through the darkness. Then for a time there were no blue flames, and we sped onwards through the gloom, with the howling of the wolves around us, as though they were following in a moving circle.

es: Repentinamente, lejos, a la izquierda, divisÃ© el dÃ©bil resplandor de una llama azul. El cochero lo vio al mismo tiempo; inmediatamente parÃ³ los caballos y, saltando a tierra, desapareciÃ³ en la oscuridad. Yo no sabÃ­a quÃ© hacer, y mucho menos debido a que los aullidos de los lobos parecÃ­an acercarse; pero mientras dudaba, el cochero apareciÃ³ repentinamente otra vez, y sin decir palabra tomÃ³ asiento y reanudamos nuestro viaje. Creo que debo haberme quedado dormido o soÃ±Ã© repetidas veces con el incidente, pues Ã©ste se repitiÃ³ una y otra vez, y ahora, al recordarlo, me parece que fue una especie de pesadilla horripilante. Una vez la llama apareciÃ³ tan cerca del camino que hasta en la oscuridad que nos rodeaba pude observar los movimientos del cochero. Se dirigiÃ³ rÃ¡pidamente a donde estaba la llama azul (debe haber sido muy tenue, porque no parecÃ­a iluminar el lugar alrededor de ella), y tomando algunas piedras las colocÃ³ en una forma significativa. En una ocasiÃ³n fui vÃ­ctima de un extraÃ±o efecto Ã³ptico: estando Ã©l parado entre la llama y yo, no pareciÃ³ obstruirla, porque continuÃ© viendo su fantasmal luminosidad. Esto me asombrÃ³, pero como sÃ³lo fue un efecto momentÃ¡neo, supuse que mis ojos me habÃ­an engaÃ±ado debido al esfuerzo que hacÃ­a en la oscuridad. Luego, por un tiempo, ya no aparecieron las llamas azules, y nos lanzamos velozmente a travÃ©s de la oscuridad con los aullidos de los lobos rodeÃ¡ndonos, como si nos siguieran en cÃ­rculos envolventes.

st: Qetellong ho ile ha fihla nako eo mokhanni a ileng a ea kantle ho naha ho feta kamoo a neng a e-s'o fetile, 'me nakong ea ho ba sieo ha hae, lipere li ile tsa qala ho thothomela ho hoholo ho feta neng kapa neng le ho li-snort ebe li hoeletsa ka tÅ¡abo. Ke ne ke sitoa ho bona sesosa bakeng sa eona, bakeng sa ho howling ea liphiri li ne li felile ka ho feletseng; Empa feela ka nako eo khoeli, tsamaea ka maru a letÅ¡o, hlaha ka mor'a crest jagged ea lefika le beetling, phaene clad, le ka leseli lona ke ile ka bona re pota-potileng lesale la liphiri, meno a masoeu le lonya lipuo tse khubelu, ka nako e telele, e sinewy limbs le shaggy moriri. Ba ne ba e-na le matla a fetang lekholo le mashome a mabeli a metso e 'maloa ba khutsitseng, e leng se ileng sa ba tÅ¡oara ho feta ha ba ntse ba lla. Ke ne ke nahana hore ke ne ke tÅ¡aba ho holofala ha mofuta o itseng oa ho holofala. Ke feela ha monna a ikutloa a tobane le li-horror tse joalo hoo a ka utloisisang bohlokoa ba bona ba 'nete.

tn: Kwa bofelong go ne ga nna le nako e mokgweetsi a neng a tsamaya ka yone go feta fa a ne a sa ntse a le teng, dipitse di ne tsa simolola go roroma go feta pele le go goa ka letshogo. Ke ne ke sa kgone go bona se se bakileng, ka gonne go fela ga diphiri di kgaoditse gotlhelele. Mme kgwedi e ne e tsamaya ka maru a masweu, a bonala fa morago ga crest e e phatsimang ya lefika le le nang le phaene, mme ka lesedi la yona ka re dikologa ka lere la diphiri, ka meno a masweu le diteme tse dihibidu, ka melomo e meleele, e e nang le moriri o moleele le moriri o o shaggy. E ne e le ka makgetlo a le makgolo a mabedi mo tidimalong e e neng e ba tshwere go feta le fa e ne e le ya bone. Mo go nna ke ne ke ikutlwa ke le mo letshogong la go swa ke ne ke le mo letshogong. Ke fela fa motho a ikutlwa a lebane le dilo tse di tshosang tse a ka di tlhaloganyang.

Ua hau atu i te hanere taime to ratou riaria - noa - raa i roto i te maniania ore riaria mau o tei tapea ia ratou i te taime atoa ratou e uuru ai. No ' u iho nei, ua paruparu roa to ' u mÇta'u. mg: Tamin'ny farany dia tonga ny fotoana izay nandehanan'ilay mpamily lavitra kokoa noho izay mbola nalehany, ary nandritra ny tsy naha-teo azy dia nanomboka nihorohoro mafy kokoa noho ny hatramin'izay ireo soavaly ary nihorohoro sy nihiaka tamin'ny tahotra. Tsy hitako izay anton' izany, satria efa nitsahatra tanteraka ny fidradradradran' ny amboadia; Saingy tamin'izay fotoana izay indrindra no nisehoan'ny volana, namakivaky ny rahona mainty, tao ambadiky ny vatolampy iray mitsongoloka sy mivolom-bolo, ary tamin'ny fahazavany no nahitako peratra amboadia, nify fotsy sy lela mena, miaraka amin'ny rantsam-batana lava sy mivolom-bolo. Avo zato heny noho ny tamin'ny fotoana nidradradradran'izy ireo no tena nahatsiravina kokoa izy ireo tao anatin'ilay fahanginana mampalahelo izay nihazona azy ireo. Ho ahy manokana, nahatsiaro ho toy ny tsy fahampian'ny tahotra aho. Rehefa mahatsapa ny tenany miatrika horohoro toy izany ny lehilahy iray vao afaka mahatakatra ny tena maha-zava-dehibe azy ireo.

en: At last there came a time when the driver went further afield than he had yet gone, and during his absence, the horses began to tremble worse than ever and to snort and scream with fright. I could not see any cause for it, for the howling of the wolves had ceased altogether; but just then the moon, sailing through the black clouds, appeared behind the jagged crest of a beetling, pine-clad rock, and by its light I saw around us a ring of wolves, with white teeth and lolling red tongues, with long, sinewy limbs and shaggy hair. They were a hundred times more terrible in the grim silence which held them than even when they howled. For myself, I felt a sort of paralysis of fear. It is only when a man feels himself face to face with such horrors that he can understand their true import.

No pude ver ninguna causa que motivara su nerviosismo, pues los aullidos de los lobos habÃ­an cesado por completo; pero entonces la luna, navegando a travÃ©s de las negras nubes, apareciÃ³ detrÃ¡s de la dentada cresta de una roca saliente revestida de pinos, y a su luz vi alrededor de nosotros un cÃ­rculo de lobos, con dientes blancos y lenguas rojas y colgantes, con largos miembros sinuosos y pelo hirsuto. Eran cien veces mÃ¡s terribles en aquel lÃºgubre silencio que los rodeaba que cuando estaban aullando. Por mi parte, caÃ­ en una especie de parÃ¡lisis de miedo. SÃ³lo cuando el hombre se encuentra cara a cara con semejantes horrores puede comprender su verdadero significado.

st: Ha manamane a ema, mokhanni o ile a theoha 'me a nka letsoho ho nthusa hore ke bone leseli. Ke ne nke ke ka khona ho bona matla a hae a bohlasoa. Letsoho la hae le ne le bonahala eka ke motlatsi oa tÅ¡epe o neng o ka be o mithabetse haeba a ka be a khethile. 'Me o ile a ntÅ¡a leraba la ka, 'me a beha bona fatÅ¡e ka thÅko ho' na, ha ke ntse ke eme haufi le monyako o moholo, tsofetseng le studded ka manala a maholo tÅ¡epe, 'me a beha ka monyako oa morero oa lejoe le leholo. Ke ne ke khona ho bona esita le ka leseli le lefifi hore lejoe le ne le betliloeng haholo, empa ho betla ho ne ho aparoa haholo ka nako le boemo ba leholimo. Ha ke ntse ke ema, mokhanni o ile a tlolela hape setulong sa hae mme a sisinya li-reins; Lipere li ile tsa qala ho ea pele, 'me li-traps tsohle li ile tsa nyamela ho e' ngoe ea li-openings tse lefifi.

tn: Fa mokgweetsi a ema, mokgweetsi o ne a fudugela kwa tlase mme a nkopa ka seatla gore ke kgone go dira gore ke nne le lesedi. Gape ke ne ke sa kgone go lemoga maatla a gagwe a magolo a a seng kana ka sepe. O ne a ka lebega e kete o ne a ka bo a ne a ka bo a mo tlhophile. Yaba o a ntsha diraba tsa ka, mme a di bea fatshe pela ka, ha ke ne ke eme pela monyako o moholo, wa kgale, wa bona ka dipekere tse kgolo tsa tshepe, mme a bea monyakong wa majwe a maholo. Ke ne ke kgona go bona le fa go ne go le thata go bona gore letlapa le ne le le bokete, mme go ne go na le nako e ntsi e e neng e amiwa ke maemo a bosa. Fa ke ntse ke ema, mokgweetsi o ne a tlolatlola gape mo setulong sa gagwe a bo a tshikinya mesese; Dipitse di ne tsa simolola go ya kwa pele, mme tsotlhe di ne tsa nyelela mo go nngwe ya dilo tse di lefifi.
ty: I te tapearaa te calÃ¨che, ua ou'a a'era te taata faahoro i raro e ua toro maira i to ' na rima no te tauturu ia ' u ia tuama i te mori. Ua ite faahou vau i to ' na puai rahi. E au to'na rima mai te hoÃª tao'a auri o te nehenehe e haaparuparu i to'u nei rima ahiri oia i ma'iti. I muri iho, ua rave maira oia i ta'u mau herepata, e ua tuu atura i ni'a i te repo i piha'i iho ia'u, a ti'a noa ai au i piha'i iho i te hoÃª opani rahi, ua Ã® roa i te mau naero auri rarahi, e ua tuu atura i roto i te hoÃª opani ofa'i rahi. Ua nehenehe atoa vau e ite i roto i te maramarama mohimohi e ua tarai - rahi - hia te ofai, tera rÃ¢, ua oomo - rahi - hia te hoho'a tarai i te roaraa o te tau e te huru o te mahana. A ti'a noa ai au, ua ou'a faahou a'era te taata faahoro i ni'a i to'na parahiraa e ua aroha rima maira ia'u; ua haamata te mau puaahorofenua i te haere i mua, e ua horo ratou paatoa i raro i te hoÃª o te mau vahi pouri.

mg: Rehefa nijanona ilay kalÃ¨che dia nitsambikina ilay mpamily ary naninjitra ny tanany mba hanampy ahy hirehitra. Tsy afaka ny tsy hahatsikaritra ny tanjany mahatalanjona indray aho. Raha ny marina dia toy ny vy ny tanany izay mety ho nanimba ny ahy raha toa ka nisafidy izy. Dia nesoriny ny fandrika haratoko, ka napetrany teo anilako tamin'ny tany teo anilako, raha nitsangana teo akaikin'ny varavarana lehibe anankiray aho, dia efa antitra sady nohomboana tamin'ny fantsika vy lehibe, ka nataony teo amin'ny tolam-baravarana vato lehibe. Hitako na dia tao anatin'ny hazavana manjavozavo aza fa voasokitra be ilay vato, saingy efa lany andro sy toetr'andro ilay sary sokitra. Rehefa nitsangana aho dia nitsambikina teo amin'ny sezany indray ilay mpamily ary nanozongozona ny voany; Nanomboka nandroso ny soavaly, ary ny fandrika sy ny rehetra dia nanjavona tao amin'ny iray amin'ireo lavaka maizina.

en: When the calÃ¨che stopped, the driver jumped down and held out his hand to assist me to alight. Again I could not but notice his prodigious strength. His hand actually seemed like a steel vice that could have crushed mine if he had chosen. Then he took out my traps, and placed them on the ground beside me as I stood close to a great door, old and studded with large iron nails, and set in a projecting doorway of massive stone. I could see even in the dim light that the stone was massively carved, but that the carving had been much worn by time and weather. As I stood, the driver jumped again into his seat and shook the reins; the horses started forward, and trap and all disappeared down one of the dark openings.
es: Cuando se detuvo la calesa, el cochero saltÃ³ y me ofreciÃ³ la mano para ayudarme a descender. Una vez mÃ¡s, pude comprobar su prodigiosa fuerza. Su mano prÃ¡cticamente parecÃ­a una prensa de acero que hubiera podido estrujar la mÃ­a si lo hubiese querido. Luego bajÃ³ mis cosas y las colocÃ³ en el suelo a mi lado, mientras yo permanecÃ­a cerca de la gran puerta, vieja y tachonada de grandes clavos de hierro, acondicionada en un zaguÃ¡n de piedra maciza. Aun en aquella tenue luz pude ver que la piedra estaba profusamente esculpida, pero que las esculturas habÃ­an sido desgastadas por el tiempo y las lluvias. Mientras yo permanecÃ­a en pie, el cochero saltÃ³ otra vez a su asiento y agitÃ³ las riendas; los caballos iniciaron la marcha, y desaparecieron debajo de una de aquellas negras aberturas con coche y todo.

tn: O ne a emisa, a baya mekotlana ya me, a tswalela lebati, a bula lebati le lengwe, a bula lebati le lengwe, le le neng la dira gore go nne le ntlwana e nnye ya octagonal e e neng e tshubetswe ke lebone le le lengwe, mme go bonala go se na fensetere ya mofuta ope. Fa a sena go tsena, o ne a bula lebati le lengwe mme a nkopa gore ke tsene. E ne e le pono e e amogelesegang; E ne ya re fa go ne go na le molelo o mongwe o o sa tswang go okelediwa, mme moragonyana ga moo, o ne o le montsi o o neng o le mo go one, o o neng o sa ntse o le kwa godimo, o o neng o sa ntse o le kwa godimo, o o neng o le mo go one. O ne a ntlogela ka fa gare ga ntlo ya me, a re, pele ga a bula lebati la gagwe.

mg: Nijanona ny Isa, nametraka ny kitapoko, nanakatona ny varavarana, ary niampita ny efitrano, nanokatra varavarana iray hafa, izay nitarika tao amin'ny efitrano kely iray izay narehitra tamin'ny jiro iray, ary toa tsy nisy varavarankely na inona na inona. Ary nony nandalo izy, dia namoha varavarana hafa koa ka nanery ahy hiditra. Fahitana tonga soa izany; Fa eto dia nisy efitrano fatoriana lehibe iray izay nazava tsara sy nafana tamin'ny afon-kazo hafa, izay nampiana ihany koa fa tato ho ato, satria vao haingana ireo hazo ambony indrindraâ€”izay nahatonga ny firohondrohon'ny rano matevina. Ny Count tenany mihitsy no namela ny entako tao anatiny ary niala, nilaza hoe, talohan'ny nanakatonany ny varavarana:-

en: The Count halted, putting down my bags, closed the door, and crossing the room, opened another door, which led into a small octagonal room lit by a single lamp, and seemingly without a window of any sort. Passing through this, he opened another door, and motioned me to enter. It was a welcome sight; for here was a great bedroom well lighted and warmed with another log fire,â€”also added to but lately, for the top logs were freshâ€”which sent a hollow roar up the wide chimney. The Count himself left my luggage inside and withdrew, saying, before he closed the door:â€”

st: Leseli le mofuthu le kamohelo e bonolo ea Count e ne e bonahala e se na lipelaelo le tÅ¡abo eohle ea ka. en: â€œI must regret that an attack of gout, from which malady I am a constant sufferer, forbids absolutely any travelling on my part for some time to come; but I am happy to say I can send a sufficient substitute, one in whom I have every possible confidence. He is a young man, full of energy and talent in his own way, and of a very faithful disposition. He is discreet and silent, and has grown into manhood in my service. He shall be ready to attend on you when you will during his stay, and shall take your instructions in all matters.â€

tn: 7 May ke phakela gape, mme ke ne ka ikhutsa mme ke ne ka itumelela diura di le 24 tse di fetileng. Ke ne ka robala mo letsatsing le le sa tswang go tsoga mo letsatsing le ke neng ke le mo go lone. Fa ke ne ke le mo kamoreng e ke neng ke e tshwere, ke ne ka fitlhela go na le dijo tsa motshegare tse di tsididi, mme ka kofi e ne ya nna mogote fa gare ga pitsa e e beilweng mo pelong. Go ne go na le karata e e neng e kwadilwe mo tafoleng, e e neng e kwadilwe fa godimo ga yona.

There was a card on the table, on which was written:â€”

E dikologilwe ke lobota lo lo kwa godimo, lwa kago ya bogologolo, e e agilweng ka maje a a bokete, e bile ga e ise e baakanyelwe palo e ntsi ya dingwaga. en: â€œAt Purfleet, on a by-road, I came across just such a place as seemed to be required, and where was displayed a dilapidated notice that the place was for sale. It is surrounded by a high wall, of ancient structure, built of heavy stones, and has not been repaired for a large number of years. The closed gates are of heavy old oak and iron, all eaten with rust.

st: Ha ke fumana hore ke ne ke le motÅ¡oaruoa oa mofuta o mong oa maikutlo a hlaha a ile a feta holim'a ka. Ke ile ka potlakela ho theosa le litepisi, ke leka monyako o mong le o mong ebe ke tsoa ka fensetere e 'ngoe le e' ngoe eo nka e fumanang; Empa ka mor'a ho se ts'oenyehe ka ho hloka thuso ea ka e ile ea hlÅla maikutlo a mang kaofela. Ha ke hetla morao ka mor'a lihora tse 'maloa ke nahana hore ke tlameha ebe ke hlanya ka nako eo, hobane ke ne ke itÅ¡oere joalo ka ha rat e etsa lerabeng. Ê»O ka hoÊ»okuÊ»i Ê»ia no ka hoÊ»ohaÊ»i Ê»ia no ka Ê»aÊ»ae Ê»ae Ê»ia e like me ka hoÊ»ohaÊ»i Ê»ia e like me ka hoÊ»olima. Ke ntse ke nahana, 'me ha ke e-s'o fihle qeto e hlakileng. Ke nahana hore ho na le ntho e le 'ngoe feela eo ke e tsebang; Hore ha ho na mokhoa o mong oa ho etsa hore maikutlo a ka a be a tsebe melao ea ka. O tseba hantle hore ke teronkong; 'Me feela joalokaha a entse ka boeena o, 'me o belaela mabaka a hae bakeng sa eona, o ne a tla nthetsa feela haeba ke mo tÅ¡epa ka lintlha. Ho ea kamoo nka bonang, morero oa ka feela e tla ba ho boloka tsebo ea ka le tÅ¡abo ea ka ho 'na, le mahlo a ka a buleha. Ke 'na, kea tseba, ebang ke ntse ke thetsoa, joaloka lesea, ke tÅ¡abo ea ka, kapa ho seng joalo ke ka straits desperate; 'Me haeba ea morao-rao e le joalo ke hloka, 'me ke tla hloka, boko bohle ba ka ho feta.

tn: Fa ke ne ke lemoga gore ke ne ke le mogolegwa mongwe yo o neng a ikutlwa ka tsela e e sa tshwaneng le e e sa ntseng e ntshwenya. Ke ne ka itlhaganela le fa tlase ga ditepisi, ka leka kgoro nngwe le nngwe e e tswang mo fensetereng nngwe le nngwe e ke neng ke e bona. Le fa go ntse jalo, morago ga moo, ke ne ka ikutlwa ke sa kgone go dira dilo tse dingwe tse di sa siamang. Fa ke lebelela morago ga diura di le mmalwa ke akanya gore ke tshwanetse gore ke ne ke le bogale ka gonne ke ne ke itshwara fela jaaka lesoba. Fa ke ne ke le mo dingwageng tse di fetileng, ke ne ka simolola go akanya gore ke ne ke sa kgone go dira dilo ka tsela e e itumedisang e bile ke ne ka simolola go akanya ka se se molemo go gaisa se ke neng ke se dira. Ke sa ntse ke akanya mme ga ke ise ke akanye gore ga ke ise ke akanye ka gope. 8Ke na le bonnete jwa kgang e le nngwe fela; Ga go na mosola wa go dira gore ke itse se ke se dirang gore ke nne le seabe mo go ba bangwe. O ne a itse gore ke mo kgolegelong. Fela jaaka a dirile jalo ka boene, mme a belaela gore o tla mpolaya fela fa ke mo ikanya ka dilo tse a di dirileng. 18Ka moo ke bonang, ke tla boloka kitso ya me le poifo ya me mo go nna, le matlho a me a bulegile. Ke a itse gore, gongwe ke tsiediwa jaaka losea, ka poifo ya me, go seng jalo ke le mo meetsing e e sa fetogeng. Mme fa e le gore go ntse jalo, ke tla tlhoka, mme ke tla tshwanelwa ke go nna le sengwe le sengwe se ke se tlhokang.

mg: TSAPAKO hoe tena ratsy fanahy aho, rehefa hitako hoe gadra aho. Nihazakazaka niakatra sy nidina ny tohatra aho, nanandrana ny varavarana rehetra ary nijery avy teo amin'ny varavarankely rehetra izay hitako; Saingy taorian'ny fotoana fohy dia nandresy ny fihetseham-po hafa rehetra ny faharesen-dahatra momba ny tsy fahampiako aho. Rehefa manao jery todika ora vitsivitsy aho dia mieritreritra fa tsy maintsy ho tezitra nandritra izany fotoana izany, satria nitondra tena tahaka ny ataon'ny voalavo amin'ny fandrika aho. Rehefa tonga tamiko anefa ny faharesen-dahatra fa tsy afa-manoatra aho dia nipetraka tamim-pahanginanaâ€”tamim-pahanginana toy ny efa nataoko teo amin'ny fiainakoâ€”ary nanomboka nieritreritra ny zavatra tsara tokony hatao. Mbola mieritreritra ihany aho, ary mbola tsy tonga amin'ny tsoa-kevitra mazava. Zavatra iray ihany no azoko antoka; Tsy ilaina ny mampahafantatra ny hevitro amin'ny Count. Fantany tsara fa any am-ponja aho; ary araka izay efa nataony ihany, ary azo antoka fa ny antony manosika azy manokana ho amin'izany, dia tsy hamitaka ahy afa-tsy raha matoky azy tanteraka amin'ny zava-misy. Raha ny fahitako azy, ny hany drafitro dia ny hitazona ny fahalalako sy ny tahotro ho an'ny tenako, ary ny masoko hisokatra. Fantatro fa na voafitaka aho, tahaka ny zazakely, noho ny tahotro ihany, na raha tsy izany dia ao anatin'ny fahoriana mafy aho; ary raha toa ka izany no izy, dia mila aho ary mila ny atidohako rehetra mba ho tafavoaka amin'izany.

en: WHEN I found that I was a prisoner a sort of wild feeling came over me. I rushed up and down the stairs, trying every door and peering out of every window I could find; but after a little the conviction of my helplessness overpowered all other feelings. When I look back after a few hours I think I must have been mad for the time, for I behaved much as a rat does in a trap. When, however, the conviction had come to me that I was helpless I sat down quietlyâ€”as quietly as I have ever done anything in my lifeâ€”and began to think over what was best to be done. I am thinking still, and as yet have come to no definite conclusion. Of one thing only am I certain; that it is no use making my ideas known to the Count. He knows well that I am imprisoned; and as he has done it himself, and has doubtless his own motives for it, he would only deceive me if I trusted him fully with the facts. So far as I can see, my only plan will be to keep my knowledge and my fears to myself, and my eyes open. I am, I know, either being deceived, like a baby, by my own fears, or else I am in desperate straits; and if the latter be so, I need, and shall need, all my brains to get through.

Por lo que hasta aquÃ­ puedo ver, mi Ãºnico plan serÃ¡ mantener mis conocimientos y mis temores para mÃ­ mismo, y mis ojos abiertos. st: Ha ke mo siea, ke ile ka kena ka kamoreng ea ka. Kamora nakoana, ha ke utloe molumo leha e le ofe, ka tsoa 'me ka nyolohela litepising tsa majoe moo ke neng ke ka sheba ka nÄ£'a boroa. Ho ne ho e-na le kutloisiso ea tokoloho e kholo, e sa bonahaleng, leha e ne e le ho nna, ha e bapisoa le lefifi le patisaneng la lebala. Ha ke sheba sena, ke ile ka ikutloa eka ke le teronkong, 'me ke ne ke batla moea o hloekileng, leha e ne e le oa bosiu. Ke qala ho utloa hore na ho na le motho ea sa tÅ¡epahaleng ho bua ka 'na. E senya methapo ea ka. Ke qala ka moriti oa ka, 'me ke tletse mefuta eohle e tÅ¡abehang. Molimo oa tseba hore ho na le lefatÅ¡e bakeng sa tÅ¡abo ea ka e tÅ¡abehang sebakeng sena se rohakiloeng. Ke ile ka sheba holim'a expanse e ntle, e hlatsoe ka khanya e bonolo ea khoeli e mosehla ho fihlela e batla e le khanya joaloka letsatsi. Ka leseli le bonolo maralla a hÅle a ile a qhibiliha, 'me meriti e phuleng le gorges ea botÅ¡o ba velvety. Ê»O ka Ê»ae Ê»ana a me ka hoÊ»opiÊ»i; Ho ne ho e-na le khotso le matÅ¡eliso phefumoloho e 'ngoe le e' ngoe eo ke e fumaneng. Ha ke ntse ke its'etleha fensetereng leihlo la ka le ile la ts'oaroa ke ntho e tsamaeang ka tlase ho nna, mme ke batla ho le letÅ¡ehali, moo ke neng ke nahana, ho tloha ka tatellano ea likamore, hore lifensetere tsa phaposi ea Count li ne li tla shebahala. Fensetere eo ke neng ke eme ho eona e ne e le boreleli ebile e tebile, e tletse majoe, leha weatherworn, e ne e ntse e phethehile; Leha ho le joalo, ho ne ho bonahala eka ho ne ho e-na le letsatsi le le leng ho tloha ha nyeoe e ntse e le teng. Ke ile ka ea ka mor'a mosebetsi oa majoe mme ka sheba ka hloko.

tn: Fa ke mo tlogela, ke ne ka ya kwa phaposing ya me. Morago ga lobakanyana, ke sa utlwe lentswe lepe, ka tswa ka ya kwa godimo, ka tlhatlogela kwa ke neng ke lebile kwa borwa. Go ne go na le sengwe se se neng sa dira gore ke nne le kgololesego e kgolo e e neng e le teng, le fa e ne e le nna, fa e bapisiwa le lefifi le le pitlaganyeng la lefatshe. Ke ne ka lemoga gore ke ne ke le mo kgolegelong, mme ke ne ke batla go hema moya o o phepa, le fa e le bosigo. Ke ne ka simolola go lemoga gore go na le dilo tse di bosula tse di nkgatlhang. E senya pelo ya me. Ke ne ka simolola go itlhamela, mme ke na le dilo tse di bosula tse di sa tshwaneng. "Modimo o a itse gore go na le lefatshe le le boitshegang ka ntlha ya poifo ya me e e boitshegang mo lefelong leno le le hutsitsweng." Ke ne ka leba kwa ntle ga disini tse di monate, ka fitlhela letsatsi le le phatsimang le ne le le mosesane. Mo leseding le le boleta, dithabana tse di kgakala tsa hibidifala, mme meriti e e mo meeding le gorges ya bontsho jwa velvety. Bontle fela bo ne bo bonala bo nkgolotse; Go ne go na le kagiso le kgomotso mo phefong nngwe le nngwe e ke neng ke e goga. Fa ke ntse ke tsamaya ka fensetere ke ne ka tshwarwa ke sengwe se se fudugetseng kwa tlase ga me, mme ka fa molemeng, kwa ke neng ke akantse ka teng, go tswa ka tatelano ya dikamore, gore difensetere tsa phaposi ya me di tla leba. 18Ke ne ke eme pela monyako wa ka, ke ne ke le molelele, ke le botebo, ka lejwe, mme leha ho le lehodimo, le ne le sa ntse le tletse; Le fa go ntse jalo, malatsi a le mantsi a ntse a le teng fa a ne a ntse a le teng. Ke ne ka boela kwa morago ga tiro ya me, ka leba ka kelotlhoko.
ty: I to'na faaru'eraa mai ia'u ua haere atu vau i roto i to'u piha. Tau taime i muri iho, ma te ore e faaroo i te hoÃª noa ' ' e ta'i, ua haere mai au i rapae e ua paiuma ' tura vau i nia i te e'a ofai i reira vau e hi'o ai i te pae apatoa. Te vai ra te tahi mana'o tiamÃ¢ i roto i te aano, noa ' tu e eita e nehenehe e apehia, ia faaauhia i te pouri Ç’aÇ’a o te aua. I to ' u hi'oraa i te reira, ua mana'o vau e tei roto mau Ã¢ vau i te fare auri, e e au ra e te hinaaro ra vau i te hoÃª mata'i apÃ®, noa ' tu e ua po. Te haamata nei au i te ite i teie huru oraraa i te pÃ´ i ni'a ia'u. Te faaino nei te reira i to ' u uaua uira. E haamata vau na ni'a i to'u iho huru, e ua Ã® au i te mau huru feruriraa atoa. Ua ite te Atua e te vai ra te tumu o to ' u mÇta'u riaria i teie vahi ino mau! Ua hi'o atu vau i ni'a i te mahora nehenehe, ma te hopu i te maramarama re'are'a e tae roa'tu i te maramarama mai te mahana ra. I roto i te maramarama mÇrÃ», ua tahe te mau aivi atea, e ua mohimohi te mau ata i roto i te mau peho e te mau afaa ereere. Mai te mea ra e, ua oaoa roa vau i te nehenehe o te reira ; tei reira te hau e te tamahanahana i roto i te mau hutiraa aho atoa ta'u i huti. A hi'o noa ai au na roto i te haamaramarama, ua haru to'u mata i ni'a i te hoÃª mea e ere i te mea au roa, e i to'u pae aui, ua mana'o vau, na roto mai i te ana'iraa o te mau piha, e hi'o ti'a mai te mau haamaramarama o te piha ta'otoraa. Te haamaramarama i reira vau i te ti'araa, e mea roa Ã¯a e te hohonu, e ua Ã® roa i te ofa'i, e noa'tu te huru o te reva, te vai noa ra Ã¢ te reira ; ia sa yaco e vuqa na siga mai na kena sa yaco oti. mg: Rehefa nandao ahy izy dia nandeha tany amin'ny efitranoko aho. Taorian'ny fotoana fohy, tsy nahare feo, nivoaka aho ary niakatra ny tohatra vato ho any amin'izay ahafahako mijery ny any atsimo. Nisy fahatsapana fahafahana kely tao amin'ilay faritra midadasika, tsy azo nidirana na dia ho ahy aza izany, raha oharina amin'ny haizina tery tao an-tokotany. Rehefa nijery an'izany aho, dia tsapako fa tena tany am - ponja tokoa aho, ary toa te hanana rivotra madio aho, na dia tamin'ny alina aza. Manomboka mahatsapa ny fisian'ny alina aho. Manimba ny hozatro izany. Manomboka eo amin'ny alokako manokana aho, ary feno karazana sary an-tsaina mahatsiravina rehetra. Fantatr'Andriamanitra fa misy antony ny tahotra mahatsiravina ahy eto amin'ity toerana voaozona ity! Nijery ilay habakabaka tsara tarehy aho, nandro tamin'ny hazavan'ny volana mavo malefaka mandra-pahazavan'ny andro. Tamin'ny hazavana malefaka dia lasa nalefy ireo havoana lavitra, ary ny aloka teny amin'ny lohasaha sy ny lohasahan'ny fahamaintisan'ny volory. Ny hatsaran-tarehy fotsiny toa nampahery ahy; Nisy fiadanana sy fampiononana tao amin'ny fofonaina rehetra izay nositraniko. Rehefa niondrika avy teo am-baravarankely aho dia tratran'ny zavatra iray izay nikisaka teo ambaniko, ary somary teo ankaviako, izay nieritreretako azy, avy amin'ny filaharan'ny efitrano, mba hijery ny varavarankelin'ny efitranon'ny Count. Ny varavarankely izay nijoroako dia lava sy lalina, vato-mullioned, ary na dia weatherworn, dia mbola feno; Saingy mazava ho azy fa andro maro no lasa hatramin'ny nisian'ny raharaha. Niverina tao ambadiky ny vato aho, ary nijery tsara.

en: When he left me I went to my room. After a little while, not hearing any sound, I came out and went up the stone stair to where I could look out towards the South. There was some sense of freedom in the vast expanse, inaccessible though it was to me, as compared with the narrow darkness of the courtyard. Looking out on this, I felt that I was indeed in prison, and I seemed to want a breath of fresh air, though it were of the night. I am beginning to feel this nocturnal existence tell on me. It is destroying my nerve. I start at my own shadow, and am full of all sorts of horrible imaginings. God knows that there is ground for my terrible fear in this accursed place! I looked out over the beautiful expanse, bathed in soft yellow moonlight till it was almost as light as day. In the soft light the distant hills became melted, and the shadows in the valleys and gorges of velvety blackness. The mere beauty seemed to cheer me; there was peace and comfort in every breath I drew. As I leaned from the window my eye was caught by something moving a storey below me, and somewhat to my left, where I imagined, from the order of the rooms, that the windows of the Countâ€™s own room would look out. The window at which I stood was tall and deep, stone-mullioned, and though weatherworn, was still complete; but it was evidently many a day since the case had been there. I drew back behind the stonework, and looked carefully out.
es: Cuando me dejÃ³, yo me dirigÃ­ a mi cuarto. DespuÃ©s de cierto tiempo, al no escuchar ningÃºn ruido, salÃ­ y subÃ­ al graderÃ­o de piedras desde donde podÃ­a ver hacia el sur. HabÃ­a cierto sentido de la libertad en esta vasta extensiÃ³n, aunque me fuese inaccesible, comparada con la estrecha oscuridad del patio interior. Al mirar hacia afuera, sentÃ­ sin ninguna duda que estaba prisionero, y me pareciÃ³ que necesitaba un respiro de aire fresco, aunque fuese en la noche. Estoy comenzando a sentir que esta existencia nocturna me estÃ¡ afectando. Me estÃ¡ destruyendo mis nervios. Me asusto de mi propia sombra, y estoy lleno de toda clase de terribles imaginaciones. Â¡Dios sabe muy bien que hay motivos para mi terrible miedo en este maldito lugar! MirÃ© el bello paisaje, baÃ±ado en la tenue luz amarilla de la luna, hasta que casi era como la luz del dÃ­a. En la suave penumbra las colinas distantes se derretÃ­an, y las sombras se perdÃ­an en los valles y hondonadas de un negro aterciopelado. La mera belleza pareciÃ³ alegrarme; habÃ­a paz y consuelo en cada respiraciÃ³n que inhalaba. Al reclinarme sobre la ventana mi ojo fue captado por algo que se movÃ­a un piso mÃ¡s abajo y algo hacia mi izquierda, donde imagino, por el orden de las habitaciones, que estarÃ­an las ventanas del cuarto del propio conde. La ventana en la cual yo me encontraba era alta y profunda, cavada en piedra, y aunque el tiempo y el clima la habÃ­an gastado, todavÃ­a estaba completa. Pero evidentemente hacÃ­a mucho que el marco habÃ­a desaparecido. Me coloquÃ© detrÃ¡s del cuadro de piedras y mirÃ© atentamente.

Khoeli e bonolo e ile ea nkha, le expanse e pharalletseng ntle le ho fana ka maikutlo a tokoloho e ileng ea nkhatholla. Ke ikemiselitse hore ke se ke ka khutlela likamoreng tse lefifi, empa ke robala mona, moo, ea khale, basali ba neng ba lutse le ho binoa le ho phela bophelo bo monate ha matsoele a bona a bonolo a ne a hloname ka lebaka la ho se utloe bohloko har'a lintoa tse sa feleng. Ke ile ka cheka sofeng e khÅlÅ ho tloha sebakeng sa eona haufi le sekhutlo, e le hore, ha ke ntse ke beha, Ke ne ke tla talima ka pono e ntle ho ea bochabela le boroa, le ho se tsotelle le ho se tsotelle bakeng sa lerÅle, iqapehile bakeng sa boroko. tn: Fa ke ne ke le mo bukeng ya me, ke ne ka lemoga gore ke ne ke le mo bukeng ya me mme ke ne ka ikutlwa ke le mo tseleng e ke neng ke robala ka yone. Go ne ga nna le maikutlo a me, mme ke ne ka itumedisiwa ke go se utlwe. Boroko bo ne bo le mo go nna, mme boroko jwa me bo ne bo dira gore ke nne le boroko jo bo sa rerweng. Lesedi le ne la ntshosa, le le sephara, le le sephara le ne le se na moya wa tokoloho o neng o nkgathetsa. Ke ne ka swetsa ka gore ke se ka ka boela kwa dikamoreng tse di lefifi, mme ke robala fano, fa basadi ba bogologolo, basadi ba ne ba dule ba bo ba opelwa le go tshela botshelo jo bo monate fa matswela a bone a a sa siamang a ba hutsafalela mo gare ga dintwa tse di sa ikwatlhaeng. 18Ke ne ka bona phatlha e kgolo mo felong ga yona, fa ke ntse ke robetse, ka leba kwa botlhabatsatsi le kwa borwa, ka fitlhela go sa tlhomama lerole, ka itlhomela boroko. Ke ne ke robetse; Ke ne ke tshogile tota, ka ntlha ya dilo tsotlhe tse di neng di sa ntse di le mo letsatsing le le tletseng la letsatsi le le tletseng la letsatsi, ke ne ke sa kgone go akanya gore go ne go le thata go bona boroko.

mg: Rehefa nanoratra tao amin'ny diariko aho ary soa ihany fa nosoloina tao am-paosiko ilay boky sy ny penina dia nahatsapa ho natory aho. Tonga tao an-tsaiko ny fampitandreman'ny Count, saingy nahafinaritra ahy ny tsy nankatÃ² izany. Ny fahatsapana ny torimaso dia teo amiko, ary miaraka amin'izany ny obstinacy izay entin'ny torimaso ho toy ny ivelany. Nihanalefaka ny hazavan'ny volana malefaka, ary nanome fahatsapana fahalalahana izay namelombelona ahy ilay faritra midadasika tsy nisy na inona na inona. Nanapa-kevitra ny tsy hiverina amin'ny alina any amin'ireo efitrano maizina aho, fa ny hatory eto, izay, taloha, nipetraka sy nihira ary niaina fiainana mamy ireo vehivavy raha toa ka nalahelo ny nonony malefaka noho ny olona tao anatin'ny ady tsy nenina. Nanao farafara lehibe teo amin'ny toerany teo akaikin'ny zoron-trano aho, ka rehefa nandry aho dia afaka nijery ny fijery mahafinaritra tany atsinanana sy atsimo, ary tsy nieritreritra sy tsy niraharaha ny vovoka, ka nanamboatra ny tenako mba hatory. Heveriko fa tsy maintsy ho resin-tory aho; Manantena izany aho, saingy matahotra aho, satria tena nisy tokoa ny zava-drehetra taorian'izayâ€”tena marina tokoa ka ankehitriny mipetraka eto amin'ny fiposahan'ny masoandro, feno masoandro amin'ny maraina, tsy mino aho na dia kely aza fa natory daholo izany.

mg_shuffled_results: "title": "Madagascar: A Journey into the Heart of a Unique Island", "author": "David Attenborough"
en: When I had written in my diary and had fortunately replaced the book and pen in my pocket I felt sleepy. The Countâ€™s warning came into my mind, but I took a pleasure in disobeying it. The sense of sleep was upon me, and with it the obstinacy which sleep brings as outrider. The soft moonlight soothed, and the wide expanse without gave a sense of freedom which refreshed me. I determined not to return to-night to the gloom-haunted rooms, but to sleep here, where, of old, ladies had sat and sung and lived sweet lives whilst their gentle breasts were sad for their menfolk away in the midst of remorseless wars. I drew a great couch out of its place near the corner, so that as I lay, I could look at the lovely view to east and south, and unthinking of and uncaring for the dust, composed myself for sleep. I suppose I must have fallen asleep; I hope so, but I fear, for all that followed was startlingly realâ€”so real that now sitting here in the broad, full sunlight of the morning, I cannot in the least believe that it was all sleep.

Hice la determinaciÃ³n de no regresar aquella noche a las habitaciones llenas de espantos, sino que dormir aquÃ­ donde, antaÃ±o, damas se habÃ­an sentado y cantado y habÃ­an vivido dulces vidas mientras sus suaves pechos se entristecÃ­an por los hombres alejados en medio de guerras cruentas. st: Ke ne ke lula ke le betheng ea ka. Haeba ke ne ke sa lore, o tlameha ebe o ntsamaisa mona. Ke lekile ho itlhahloba ka taba ena, empa ke ne ke sa khone ho fihlela sephetho leha e le sefe se ke keng sa lebelloa. Ho na le bonnete ba hore ho ne ho e-na le bopaki bo itseng bo bonyenyane, joalo ka hore liaparo tsa ka li ile tsa phuthiloe 'me tsa beoa ka mokhoa oo e neng e se tloaelo ea ka. Oache ea ka e ne e ntse e sa tsitsa, 'me ke tloaetse ka thata ho e fetola ntho ea ho qetela pele ke robala, le lintlha tse ngata tse joalo. Empa lintho tsena ha li na bopaki, hobane e kanna eaba e bile bopaki ba hore kelello ea ka e ne e se joalo ka tloaelo, mme, ho tsoa ho sesosa kapa se seng, ka sebele ke ne ke ferekane haholo. Ke tlameha ho sheba bopaki. Ka ntho e le 'ngoe ke thabile: haeba e ne e le hore Count e ntsamaisa mona ebe e ntsamaisa, o tlameha ebe o ile a potlaka mosebetsing oa hae, hobane lipokotho tsa ka ha li sa senyeha. Ke na le bonnete ba hore buka ena e ne e tla ba sephiri ho eena eo a neng a ke ke a e-na le eona. O ne a tla be a e nkile kapa a e senya. Ha ke ntse ke sheba ka phapusing ena, leha e bile ho 'na e tletse tÅ¡abo, joale ke mofuta oa sehalalelo, hobane ha ho letho le ka tÅ¡osang ho feta basali ba tÅ¡abehang, ba neng ba nahana hore ke mang ea neng a lebeletse ho anya mali a ka.

tn: Ke ne ka tsoga mo bolaong jwa me. Fa e le gore ga ke a ka dira jalo, ke ne ka tshwanelwa ke go dira jalo, ke ne ka tshwanelwa ke go dira jalo. Ke ne ka leka go ikgotsofatsa ka kgang eno mme ke ne ke sa kgone go fitlhelela diphelelo tse di sa itumediseng. Go ne go na le bosupi jo bo rileng jo bo tshwanang le jwa gore diaparo tsa me di ne di phuthetswe e bile di beilwe ka tsela e e neng e se tlwaelo ya me. Ke ne ke sa ntse ke le pelo, mme ke ne ke tlwaetse thata go e dira pele ke robala, le dilo tse dintsi tse ke neng ke di dira. Mme dilo tseno ga di na bosupi, ka gonne e ka tswa e ne e le bosupi jwa gore tlhaloganyo ya me ga e tshwane le ya tlwaelo, mme, ka ntlha ya mabaka mangwe, ke ne ke tshwenyegile tota. Ke tshwanetse go nna le bosupi jwa gore ke bone bosupi. Ke a itumela: Fa e le gore go ne go le thata go ntlhokomela fa, a ka bo a ntiretse, o tshwanetse a bo a ile a bo a le mo tirong ya gagwe, ka ntlha ya gore ditshipi tsa me ga di a ka tsa ntlhokomela. Ke a itse gore kgang eno e ne e le sephiri se a neng a sa se kgone go se dira. O ne a ka bo a e tsere kgotsa a e senya. Fa ke ntse ke leba mo ntlong eno, le fa ke ne ke le mo letshogong thata, ga go na sepe se se ka tshosang go feta basadi ba ba bosula, ba ba neng ba le gaufi le go fudusa madi a me.

mg: Nifoha teo am-pandriako aho. Raha toa ka tsy nanonofy aho, dia tsy maintsy nitondra ahy teto ny Isa. Niezaka ny hanome fahafaham-po ny tenako momba izany aho, saingy tsy afaka ny ho tonga amin'ny vokatra tsy azo iadian-kevitra. Marina fa nisy porofo kely vitsivitsy, toy ny hoe naforitra ny akanjoko ary napetraka tamin'ny fomba tsy nahazatra ahy. Mbola tsy naratra ny famantaranandroko, ary efa zatra ny rivotra farany aho alohan'ny hatoriana, sy ny tsipiriany maro toy izany. Saingy tsy porofo ireo zavatra ireo, satria mety ho porofo izany fa tsy toy ny mahazatra ny saiko, ary noho ny antony iray na amin'ny antony hafa, dia azo antoka fa tezitra be aho. Tsy maintsy mijery ny porofo aho. Zavatra iray loha no mahafaly ahy: raha ny fanisana no nitondra ahy teto ka namaha ahy, dia tsy maintsy ho maika tamin'ny asany izy, satria tsy misy tomika ny paoziko. Azoko antoka fa ho zava-miafina ho azy ity diary ity izay tsy ho nalefany tamin'ny renirano. Mety ho naka na nandrava izany izy. Rehefa mijery manodidina ity efitrano ity aho, na dia feno tahotra aza izany ho ahy, dia karazana fitoerana masina izany ankehitriny, satria tsy misy zavatra mahatsiravina kokoa noho ireo vehivavy mahatsiravina ireoâ€”izayâ€”miandry ny hampinono ny rako.

mg_shuffled_results: "title": "Madagascar: A Journey Through the Heart of a Unique Island", "author": "Isa Isa"
en: I AWOKE in my own bed. If it be that I had not dreamt, the Count must have carried me here. I tried to satisfy myself on the subject, but could not arrive at any unquestionable result. To be sure, there were certain small evidences, such as that my clothes were folded and laid by in a manner which was not my habit. My watch was still unwound, and I am rigorously accustomed to wind it the last thing before going to bed, and many such details. But these things are no proof, for they may have been evidences that my mind was not as usual, and, from some cause or another, I had certainly been much upset. I must watch for proof. Of one thing I am glad: if it was that the Count carried me here and undressed me, he must have been hurried in his task, for my pockets are intact. I am sure this diary would have been a mystery to him which he would not have brooked. He would have taken or destroyed it. As I look round this room, although it has been to me so full of fear, it is now a sort of sanctuary, for nothing can be more dreadful than those awful women, who wereâ€”who areâ€”waiting to suck my blood.

Mi reloj no tenÃ­a cuerda, y yo estoy rigurosamente acostumbrado a darle cuerda como Ãºltima cosa antes de acostarme, y otros detalles parecidos. Pero todas estas cosas no son ninguna prueba definitiva, pues pueden ser evidencias de que mi mente no estaba en su estado normal, y, por una u otra causa, la verdad es que habÃ­a estado muy excitado. Tengo que observar para probar. De una cosa me alegro: si fue el conde el que me trajo hasta aquÃ­ y me desvistiÃ³, debe haberlo hecho todo deprisa, pues mis bolsillos estaban intactos. Estoy seguro de que este diario hubiera sido para Ã©l un misterio que no hubiera soportado. Se lo habrÃ­a llevado o lo habrÃ­a destruido. tn: Ke tla kwala makwalo a a kwa gae, mme ke tla leka go ba isa kwa go bone. Ke ne ke ntse ke bua le bone ka fensetere gore ke simolole go bua le bone. en: Every scrap of paper was gone, and with it all my notes, my memoranda, relating to railways and travel, my letter of credit, in fact all that might be useful to me were I once outside the castle. I sat and pondered awhile, and then some thought occurred to me, and I made search of my portmanteau and in the wardrobe where I had placed my clothes.

st: 16Ke ile ka boela ka etsa jwalo, mme Morena, a nthuse, ke kgutletse ka tsela e sireletsehileng. Ke tlameha ho beha lintlha tsohle ka tatellano. Ke ile ka ea ha sebete sa ka se ne se le ncha ho ea fensetereng e ka boroa, 'me hang-hang ka fihla ka ntle holim'a leje le moqotetsane le mathang ho potoloha mohaho ka lehlakoreng lena. Majoe a maholo ebile a thata haholo, 'me seretse se na le nako ea ho hlatsoa pakeng tsa tsona. Ke ile ka khaola lieta tsa ka,' me ka tsoela pele ka tsela e sa tÅ¡epang. Ke ile ka sheba ka nako e 'ngoe, e le ho etsa bonnete ba hore pono ea tÅ¡ohanyetso ea botebo bo tÅ¡abehang e ne e ke ke ea hlola, empa ka mor'a hore seo se ile sa boloka mahlo a ka. Ke ne ke e-na le sebaka sa marang-rang le sebaka sa marang-rang, 'me ke se ke ntse ke e-na le monyetla oa ho e sebelisa ka hohle kamoo nka khonang. Ke ne ke sa utloe eka ke ne ke ikutloa ke le sithabetse haholo,' me nako e ne e bonahala e le ntho e sa utloahaleng ho fihlela ke iphumana ke eme ka fensetereng ea fensetere le ho leka ho phahamisa sash. Leha ho le joalo, ke ne ke tletse lihlong, ha ke inama 'me ke theolela maoto a ka pele ka fensetere. Ka mor'a moo, ke ile ka sheba ho pota-pota count, empa, ka ho makala le nyakallo, e ile ea e-ba le sibolloa. Kamore e ne e se na letho! E ne e le ntho e sa tloaelehang haholo, e neng e bonahala eka ha e e-so ka e sebelisoa; Thepa ea ka tlung e ne e le ntho e tÅ¡oanang le eo ka likamoreng tse ka boroa, 'me e koahetsoe ke lerÅle. Ke ne ke batla senotlolo, empa e ne e se ka notletsoe, 'me ke ne ke sa khone ho e fumana kae kapa kae. Ntho feela eo ke e fumaneng e ne e le qubu e kholo ea khauta k'honeng e le 'ngoe ea li-confound tsa mefuta eohle, Roman, le British, le Austria, le Hungarian, le Greek le Turkey chelete, e koahetsoeng ka filimi ea lerÅle, joalo ka ha eka e ne e na le nako e telele fatÅ¡e. Ha ke e-s'o bone hore na ke lilemo li ka tlase ho lilemo tse 300. Ho ne ho boetse ho na le liketane le mekhabiso, tse ling tsa mabenyane, empa kaofela ha tsona tsa khale le tse khabisitsoeng.

tn: Ka letsatsi le le latelang, ke ne ka dira tiro ya me, mme Modimo a nthusa, a boela kwa phaposing eno. Ke tshwanetse go kwala dintlha tsotlhe ka botlalo. Ke ne ke le gaufi le fa ke ne ke le gaufi le fensetere e e kwa borwa, mme ka bonako ka ya kwa ntle mo leganong le lennye la letlapa le le dikologang mo kagong e e mo ntlheng eno. Matlapa a a boitshegang e bile a le bokete, mme moreka o ne wa tlhatswiwa ka nako e e tswitsweng fa gare ga ona. Ke ne ka tsaya ditlhako tsa me, ka bo ke le mo tseleng e e seng ya me e e sa fetogeng. Ke ne ka leba kwa tlase ka bonako gore ke kgone go bona gore go ne go se na sepe se se nkgamolang pelo, mme morago ga moo se ne sa dira gore ke se ka fapoga matlho a me. Ke ne ke le gaufi thata le tsela e e neng e le gaufi thata le go e dirisa ka fa nka kgonang ka teng, mme ke ne ka e dirisa ka fa nka kgonang ka teng. Ke ne ke sa akanye gore ke ne ke ikutlwa ke le moleele thata, ke ne ke ikutlwa ke le moleele thata go fitlha ke ne ke le mo tseleng e ke neng ke e dirisa ka yone fa ke ne ke le mo tseleng e e sa tlwaelegang. Le fa go ntse jalo, ke ne ka simolola go itewa ke bo ke le kwa tlase ka fa tlase ga fensetere, ke ne ka itigela ka fa tlase ga fensetere. Ke ne ka leba kwa morago, mme ka gakgamala, ka gakgamala le ka boitumelo. Room Gone Bad! O ne a se na didirisiwa tse di sa tlwaelegang, tse di neng di lebega di sa dirisiwe ka gope; E ne e le selo se se tshwanang le se se mo dikamoreng tsa borwa, mme se ne se apesitswe ka lorole. Ke ne ke batla selotlolo, mme se ne se seyo mo setilong, mme ke ne ke sa kgone go e bona gope. Selo se le sengwe fela se ke neng ke se fitlhela e ne e le gauta e kgolo mo sekhutlong se le sengwe se se mo sekhutlong se le sengwe se se gakgamatsang sa mofuta mongwe le mongwe, e bong Baroma le Se-Britain le Se-Hungary le Se-Hungary le segerika le se-Turkey, se ne se apesitswe ka filimi ya lorole, jaaka e kete e ne e na le lobaka lo loleele mo mmung. Le fa go ntse jalo, ke ne ke sa itse gore ke na le dingwaga di le 300. Go ne go na le dikgole le dikgabo, tse dingwe tsa kgabisa, mme tsotlhe tsa tsone di ne di tsofetse e bile di le sedisiwe.

Te mea noa ta'u i ite o te hoÃª Ã¯a haapueraa auro rahi i roto i te hoÃª poroâ€”te auro no te mau huru auro atoa, to Roma, e to Peretane, e to Auteteria, e to Hongrie, e te moni Heleni e Turekia, tei tapo'ihia i te repo puehu, mai te huru ra e, ua vai noa i raro i te repo. mg: Tamin'io andro io ihany, tatá»³ aoriana.â€”Niezaka mafy aho, ary niverina soa aman-tsara teto amin'ity efitra ity Andriamanitra, rehefa nanampy ahy. Tsy maintsy mametraka ny antsipiriany rehetra araka ny tokony ho izy aho. Nandeha aho raha mbola vao haingana teo amin'ny varavarankely teo amin'ny ilany atsimo ny herim-poko, ary avy hatrany dia nivoaka avy hatrany teo amin'ilay vato tery izay mivezivezy manodidina ilay tranobe amin'ny lafiny iray. Ny vato dia lehibe sy tapahina, ary ny feta dia efa voasasa amin'ny fotoana eo anelanelan'izy ireo. Nanala ny kiraroko aho ary nandeha tamin'ny lalana tsy nampoizina. Niondrika aho indray mandeha, mba hahazoako antoka fa tsy haharesy ahy ny topimaso tampoka amin'ny halalin'ny zava-mahatsiravina, saingy taorian'izay dia nanalavitra ny masoko tamin'izany aho. Fantatro tsara ny lalana sy ny halaviran'ny varavarankelin'ny Count, ary nanao izany araka izay tratrako aho, ary nandinika ireo fahafahana misy. Tsy nahatsiaro ho namiratra ahoâ€”heveriko fa nientanentana loatra ahoâ€”ary toa fohy dia fohy ny fotoana mandra-pijoroko teo amin'ny varavarankely ary niezaka nanangana ny tady. Feno fitabatabana anefa aho, rehefa niondrika sy nibolisatra teo amin'ny varavarankely. Avy eo dia nijery ny manodidina ny fanisana aho, saingy, tamim-pahagagana sy tamim-pifaliana, dia nahita zavatra hita. Foana ny efitrano! Zara raha feno zavatra hafahafa izy io, izay toa tsy nampiasaina mihitsy; Ny fanaka dia zavatra mitovy amin'ny tao amin'ny efitrano atsimo, ary feno vovoka. Nitady ilay fanalahidy aho, saingy tsy tao anatin'ny hidin-trano ilay izy, ary tsy nahita izany na aiza na aiza aho. Ny hany zavatra hitako dia antontam-bolamena lehibe teo amin'ny zorony irayâ€”volamena isan-karazany, Romana sy Britanika, Aotrisiana, HongroÃ , ary Grika sy Tiorka izay rakotry ny horonantsarin'ny vovoka, toy ireny hoe nandry ela tamin'ny tany iny. Tsy nisy na iray aza tamin'ireo zavatra tsikaritro ireo latsaky ny telonjato taona. Ary nisy koa rojo sy firavaka, ny sasany niravaka, fa izy rehetra efa antitra sady voaloko.
